title: AGAINST ALL ODDS - Best Motivational Speech (Featuring Chaunte Lowe)
itunes:title: AGAINST ALL ODDS - Best Motivational Speech (Featuring Chaunte Lowe)
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
AGAINST ALL ODDS! When things get tough, know that you can get through anything. Even against all odds. A powerful motivational speech and Exclusive Motiversity interview with four-time Olympian Chaunte Lowe.


We recently had the opportunity to interview Chaunte Lowe on our show The Icons! Chaunte is a 4-time Olympian, Olympic medalist, high jumper, and World Champion. Not only that but she holds the American record for high jump and is a 12 time US National champion.


In the interview, Chaunte shares advice on creating a life without limits, how to be your best self, and how to accept yourself for who you are.


Speaker:


Chaunte Lowe: https://www.chauntelowespeaks.com/


Music:


Really Slow Motion: http://bit.ly/1r3lPvN


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
